description: This file contains unit tests for agent interactions with shared models and tools, using pytest and unittest.mock to verify tool invocation and agent behavior.

methods.name: shared_model
methods.description: Fixture that creates and returns a shared OpenAIChat model instance.

methods.name: web_agent
methods.description: Fixture that creates a web agent with DuckDuckGoTools for testing.

methods.name: finance_agent
methods.description: Fixture that creates a finance agent with YFinanceTools for testing.

methods.name: test_tools_available_to_agents
methods.description: Test function that verifies the tools passed to agents are invoked correctly and produce expected tool names.
